entry.title: Jinyang and Jun awarded travel fund for 2025 ASME IDETC-CIE conference

link.title: Jinyang and Jun awarded travel fund for 2025 ASME IDETC-CIE conference

entry.content: Jinyang Li and Jun Li have been awarded travel funding through the Virginia Tech Graduate and Professional Student Senate (GPSS) Travel Fund Program to attend the 2025 ASME IDETC-CIE Conference. This support will help them present their research and engage with the broader engineering design and computing community. Great job, Jinyang and Jun!
entry.summary: Jinyang and Jun have been awarded travel funding through the Virginia Tech Graduate and Professional Student Senate (GPSS) Travel Fund Program to attend the 2025 ASME IDETC-CIE Conference. Congratulations!

entry.title: Jun Li awarded the Pratt Fellowship

link.title: Jun Li awarded the Pratt Fellowship

entry.content:
Jun Li, a PhD student in the SEAD Lab, has been awarded the Pratt Fellowship from Virginia Tech for the 2024-2025 academic year. Congratulations!

The Pratt Fellowship is a prestigious award given to graduate students at Virginia Tech who have demonstrated excellence in scholarship.
entry.summary: Jun Li, a PhD student in the SEAD Lab, was awarded the Pratt Fellowship from Virginia Tech for the 2024-2025 academic year. Congratulations!

entry.title: SEAD Lab welcomes two new PhD students

link.title: SEAD Lab welcomes two new PhD students

entry.content: Jun Li and Ko-Lin Wang joined the SEAD Lab in January 2025.
entry.summary: We are thrilled to have Jun and Ko-Lin joining our team.

entry.title: Jinyang Li joined the SEAD Lab

link.title: Jinyang Li joined the SEAD Lab

entry.content: Jinyang Li joined the SEAD Lab in August 2024.
entry.summary: We are thrilled to have Jinyang joining our team.

entry.title: Dr. Jie Chen joined the Editorial Board of International Journal of Fatigue

link.title: Dr. Jie Chen joined the Editorial Board of International Journal of Fatigue

entry.content: Dr. Jie Chen joined the Editorial Board of International Journal of Fatigue in August 2024.
entry.summary: Dr. Jie Chen joined the Editorial Board of International Journal of Fatigue in August 2024.

entry.title: SEAD Lab founded at Virginia Tech

link.title: SEAD Lab founded at Virginia Tech

entry.content: Stochastic Engineering Analysis & Design (SEAD) Lab was founded at Virginia Tech in August 2024.
entry.summary: Stochastic Engineering Analysis & Design (SEAD) Lab was founded at Virginia Tech in August 2024.
